brand_identity.name: EcoSayahat
brand_identity.description: A platform connecting tourists with the raw beauty of Kazakhstan while promoting eco-friendly practices.

headings.usage: Use for all section titles, hero text, and card headers. The rounded nature of Outfit mimics organic shapes.

body.usage: Use for all paragraphs, UI labels, and data inputs. Manrope is highly legible and modern.

region_selection.description: Asymmetric grid showcasing regions. Use large cards for featured regions (Burabay, Caspian) and smaller ones for others.

tourist_dashboard.description: Top-level tabs for switching contexts (Map, Attractions, Taxi, etc.). Keep the wallet visible in the header.

map_view.description: Map should take up maximum space. Floating cards for details.

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-3 bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary-hover transition-all duration-300 shadow-lg shadow-emerald-500/20 active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-6 py-3 bg-white text-primary border border-emerald-100 hover:bg-emerald-50 transition-all duration-300
buttons.ghost: rounded-lg px-4 py-2 hover:bg-emerald-50 text-emerald-700 transition-colors

cards.standard: bg-white dark:bg-emerald-900/40 rounded-2xl border border-emerald-100/50 dark:border-emerald-800 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow p-6

motion_guidelines.micro_interactions: Active states should have a subtle 'pop' effect (scale-105).

accessibility_checklist: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for text on green backgrounds.
All images must have alt text.
Interactive elements must have a minimum touch target of 44x44px.
Support keyboard navigation for tabs and map controls.

technical_instructions.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Prefer outlined style with 1.5px stroke width.
technical_instructions.maps: Use React-Leaflet with a custom tile layer (e.g., CartoDB Positron for clean look). Do NOT use default OSM tiles if possible, or style them with CSS filters to desaturate.
technical_instructions.charts: Use Recharts with the defined color palette (Emerald for positive, Amber for neutral).
technical_instructions.360_view: Ensure Pannellum viewer is responsive and lazy-loaded.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic gradients. Use subtle mesh gradients or solid colors.
Avoid using 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Outfit' or 'Manrope'.
Do not center-align everything. Use grid layouts.
Use glassmorphism for overlays (modals, floating cards) to keep context visible.
Ensure the 'EcoCoin' wallet is always visible and playful.
